document_data.mainbody:
aratathlaer, also called Tayyib-kher, was a male ancient brass dragon who made its lair somewhere in the Scimitar Spires in Anauroch. He was known to be still alive by 1373 DR.
The Bedine consider him to be a good-natured protector of the Scimitar Spires and he has been known to hold-up an entire tribes travel by engaging in long conversations with their elders.
